alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 31 at 1:34PM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and the Interstate 80 Summit eastward across Laramie County. This includes the cities of Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...Sunday evening through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
